title: Bend it like Zelem! Man Utd midfielder scores direct from two corners
shortDescription: Katie Zelem remarkably scored direct from a corner on two occasions as Manchester United cruised to a 4-0 win over Leicester in the Women's Super League.

title: Williams opts for a hug after Eriksen's rugby tackle!
shortDescription: During Norwich's game with Brentford, an angry Brandon Williams soon turned into smiles after realising the opponent who hauled him to the ground was none other than Brentford's new signing Christian Eriksen.

title: Papers: Hasenhuttl on Man Utd shortlist
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Sunday's national newspapers...

title: Rangers 1-0 Aberdeen
shortDescription: Highlights of the Scottish Premiership match between Rangers and Aberdeen.

title: Early Mane strike keeps Liverpool in title hunt
shortDescription: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Liverpool’s win over West Ham in the Premier League.

title: Bayern held by Leverkusen | Abraham wins it for Roma - Euro round-up
shortDescription: Bayern Munich's Thomas Muller had a hapless return to action when he scored a costly own goal as the Bundesliga leaders were held 1-1 at home by Bayer Leverkusen.

title: PL Predictions: Man Utd to do Liverpool huge title favour
shortDescription: Let our tipster Jones Knows take you into the Premier League weekend as he provides his insight, predictions and betting angles. He wants to back Man Utd at Man City.

title: Back a 20/1 Odegaard masterclass  - Jones Knows
shortDescription: Our tipster Jones Knows is now 75.5 points in profit for the season after Joe Willock netted him another winner - where is his money going this weekend?

title: Weir double helps Man City beat holders Chelsea in League Cup final
shortDescription: Man City ended Chelsea's dominance of the League Cup and claimed the trophy for the first time in three years after a stirring comeback saw them cruise to a 3-1 win.

title: Mane gives Liverpool nervy win over West Ham
shortDescription: Sadio Mane's first-half goal proved enough for Liverpool as they stumbled to a 1-0 win over West Ham to move them three points off leaders Man City.

title: Neville: No Man Utd player would make Man City XI
shortDescription: Gary Neville claims no Manchester United players including Cristiano Ronaldo would get into Manchester City's team. He sat down with Micah Richards in SPORTbible and Sky Bet's Agree to Disagree episode which is available in full on YouTube.

title: Lage: I don't waste time with guys who don't work hard
shortDescription: Wolves head coach Bruno Lage says he won't "waste time with guys who don't work hard" after blaming an injury to Ki-Jana Hoever on the right-back not being prepared.

title: Toney hat-trick gives Brentford big win at Norwich on Eriksen's full debut
shortDescription: Ivan Toney's hat-trick gave Brentford a significant 3-1 win at fellow relegation rivals Norwich as Christian Eriksen impressed on his first start for the Bees.

title: Dundee Utd and Hearts share spoils at Tannadice
shortDescription: Dundee United and Hearts fought out a pulsating 2-2 Scottish Premiership draw at Tannadice.

title: Chelsea fans chant 'Abramovich' during Ukraine tribute | Tuchel: Not the moment
shortDescription: Thomas Tuchel criticised Chelsea fans for chanting owner Roman Abramovich's name during a planned show of solidarity with Ukraine on Saturday.

title: EFL highlights, round-up: Bournemouth slip; Fulham edge further clear
shortDescription: Bournemouth slip up at Preston to stay third in Championship as Fulham extend lead; League One leaders Rotherham beaten and League Two leaders Forest Green held.

title: Superb Palace further dent Wolves' top-four hopes
shortDescription: Crystal Palace produced a sensational first-half performance to further damage Wolves’ top-four hopes.

title: Rampant Villa beat Saints | Gerrard: Coutinho on another level
shortDescription: Philippe Coutinho ran the show as Aston Villa beat Southampton 4-0, with Steven Gerrard claiming the Brazilian was operating on "a level that was above the game."

title: Hungbo penalty sees Ross County past St Mirren
shortDescription: Ross County moved into the top half of the Scottish Premiership with a 1-0 win over St Mirren thanks to a 49th-minute penalty from Joe Hungbo.

title: Substitute Roofe sends Rangers level with Celtic
shortDescription: Rangers snatched a 1-0 win over Aberdeen with an 81st-minute winner from substitute Kemar Roofe to maintain the pressure on Celtic in the Scottish Premiership title race.
